alert.note: Alert for Jasper (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 05 at 6:09PM CST until March 05 at 6:15PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CST FOR EASTERN POLK...SOUTHWESTERN MARSHALL...NORTHWESTERN MARION... WESTERN JASPER AND NORTHEASTERN WARREN COUNTIES... At 608 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mitchellville, or 8 miles east of Altoona, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Newton and Baxter. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for central and south central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
